alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Gentry; Nodaway; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 7:25PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Worth, northwestern Gentry, Atchison and Nodaway Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 724 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bedford to near Hamburg. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Maryville, Albany, Tarkio, Rock Port, Fairfax, Burlington Junction, Hopkins, Ravenwood, Skidmore, Conception Junction, Sheridan, Parnell, Clearmont, Elmo, Pickering, Westboro, Watson, Clyde, Gentry and Arkoe. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 99 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Missouri.
